summary: This is an upgrade for brenuin. It changes him from a bum to an awesome follower.
descriptionHtml: This is an upgrade for brenuin. It changes him from a bum to an awesome follower. I made this mod because i thought brenuin shouldn\'t be a bum, he should be a WARRIOR!!. I\'m sorry that he is weak but i tried a\'lot of things but they did not work. He is wearing the compainons armor and he has a spare set in his inventory
author: Simell
